creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of three young women seated on a striped couch with a plant in front of a window in background; woman at center has her PL hand beneath her ching and rests her head on shoulder of woman at left
inscription: on back in pencil: 3 old friends / \"3 old friends\" / JOANNE LEONARD / 1319 POMONA / ANN ARBOR / MICHIGAN | on back in black ink: FW-31
markings: on back on sticker: Joanne Leonard (crossed-out address)
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Reunion of Lifelong Friends
